name: Poetic Edda
description:
Poetic Edda is a tough roguelike 2D game set in the worlds described in Norse mythology. Pave your way through 3 unique worlds fighting elemental enemies as Thor, Loki or Sif.

Creators: Will Place, Leslie Luc (Luctekz.itch.io), Simon Newport and Rhys Barney

Known bugs: Some monitors' resolutions will cause the cursor to be pulled downwards. Fix: change your aspect ratio.

Made in Game Maker Studio
